metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6299 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The scm plug-in in mock might allow attackers to bypass the intended chrootprotection mechanism and gain root privileges via a crafted spec file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mock - 1.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mock package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-1').
